title: Kanhaiya Sweet House Website Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Create header section with business name and tagline using orange gradient background
acceptanceCriteria: Header displays 'Kanhaiya Sweet House' as main heading
Tagline 'Pure & Fresh Indian Sweets in Karhal' appears below heading
Background uses linear gradient from #ff6f00 to #ff9800
Text is white and center-aligned

file_operations.description: Add header section component with 'Kanhaiya Sweet House' heading, tagline 'Pure & Fresh Indian Sweets in Karhal', and linear gradient background from #ff6f00 to #ff9800. Use white, center-aligned text. Integrate generated hero image frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-sweets.dim_1200x400.png as visual element in or near the header.

requirements.summary: Implement navigation menu with anchor links to About, Menu, Order, and Contact sections
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation bar contains four links: About, Menu, Order, Contact
Links are styled with white text on #e65100 background
Clicking each link scrolls to corresponding section
Navigation is horizontally centered

file_operations.description: Add navigation bar with four anchor links (About, Menu, Order, Contact) pointing to #about, #menu, #order, #contact respectively. Style with white text on #e65100 background and center horizontally.

requirements.summary: Create About section with heading and description text
acceptanceCriteria: Section has id='about' for anchor navigation
Displays 'About Us' as section heading
Shows welcome text with business description
Content is center-aligned

file_operations.description: Add About section with id='about', heading 'About Us', and description text 'Welcome to Kanhaiya Sweet House. We serve fresh and delicious sweets made with pure ingredients.' Center-align content.

requirements.summary: Create Menu section displaying three sweet items in card layout
acceptanceCriteria: Section has id='menu' and heading 'Our Special Menu'
Three menu items are displayed: Laddu, Kaju Katli, Gulab Jamun
Each item shows name and price per kg in Indian Rupees
Cards have white background, 10px border-radius, and subtle shadow
Cards are centered with 250px width

file_operations.description: Add Menu section with id='menu', heading 'Our Special Menu', and three menu item cards: Laddu (₹400/kg), Kaju Katli (₹900/kg), Gulab Jamun (₹350/kg). Style cards with white background, 10px border-radius, subtle shadow, 250px width, centered alignment.

requirements.summary: Create Order section with form for customer orders
acceptanceCriteria: Section has id='order' and heading 'Place Your Order'
Form includes text input with placeholder 'Your Name'
Form includes text input with placeholder 'Mobile Number'
Form includes textarea with placeholder 'Order Details'
Submit button displays 'Submit Order' with #ff6f00 background and white text
Inputs are 80% width with consistent padding

file_operations.description: Add Order section with id='order', heading 'Place Your Order', and form containing name input (placeholder 'Your Name'), mobile number input (placeholder 'Mobile Number'), order details textarea (placeholder 'Order Details'), and submit button ('Submit Order') with #ff6f00 background and white text. Set inputs to 80% width with consistent padding.

requirements.summary: Create Contact section with address and embedded Google Maps
acceptanceCriteria: Section has id='contact' and heading 'Visit Us'
Address 'XR25+GFX, Meethepur, Karhal, 206245' is displayed
Google Maps iframe embeds with src='https://www.google.com/maps?q=XR25+GFX,Karhal&output=embed'
Map is 80% width and 250px height with no border
Content is center-aligned

file_operations.description: Add Contact section with id='contact', heading 'Visit Us', address text 'XR25+GFX, Meethepur, Karhal, 206245', and Google Maps iframe with src='https://www.google.com/maps?q=XR25+GFX,Karhal&output=embed'. Style map at 80% width, 250px height, no border, center-aligned content.

requirements.summary: Create footer section with copyright notice
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays copyright notice with year 2026
Background color is #333 with white text
Text is center-aligned

file_operations.description: Add footer section with copyright text '© 2026 Kanhaiya Sweet House | Karhal', #333 background color, white text, and center alignment.

requirements.summary: Apply warm color scheme and consistent styling throughout the application
acceptanceCriteria: Page background is #fff3e0 (cream/light orange)
All sections use 30px padding
Typography uses Arial sans-serif font family
Viewport meta tag ensures mobile responsiveness
All colors match the provided specification

file_operations.description: Set global page background to #fff3e0, apply Arial sans-serif font family, and establish 30px padding for sections. Integrate generated decorative border pattern frontend/public/assets/generated/border-pattern.dim_800x100.png as background or decorative element where appropriate.
Ensure viewport meta tag is present for mobile responsiveness.
